arguments.value: Only admin can perform this acti

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: @dev Sets the contract deployer as the admin.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only admin can perform this action"

arguments.value: Only admin can perform this action

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only admin can perform this action"

documentation.text: @dev Modifier to restrict function access to the admin only.

@dev Allows any user to donate to a specific campaign.
 @param _id The ID of the campaign to donate to.

@dev Allows the admin to withdraw the collected funds after the goal is reached.
 @param _id The ID of the campaign to withdraw from.

devdoc.details: A smart contract to manage donation campaigns. An admin creates campaigns, users can donate, and the admin can withdraw funds once the goal is met.

constructor.details: Sets the contract deployer as the admin.

createCampaign(string,uint256).details: Allows the admin to create a new donation campaign.

params._goal: The funding goal in wei for the new campaign.
params._title: The title for the new campaign.

donateToCampaign(uint256).details: Allows any user to donate to a specific campaign.

params._id: The ID of the campaign to donate to.

getCampaign(uint256).details: Retrieves core details of a specific campaign.

returns.balance: The current balance of the campaign.
returns.completed: Whether the campaign funds have been withdrawn.
returns.creator: The address of the campaign creator.
returns.goal: The funding goal of the campaign.
returns.title: The title of the campaign.

getDonationHistory(uint256).details: Retrieves the full donation history for a campaign.

returns._0: A list of all donor addresses.
returns._1: A list of corresponding donation amounts.

withdrawFunds(uint256).details: Allows the admin to withdraw the collected funds after the goal is reached.

params._id: The ID of the campaign to withdraw from.

devdoc.title: DonationEscrow
